description:
目前完成的是：Gephi统计简介，有向图、无向图、混合图的介绍，节点的度与图的平均度。

-------

新的 Gephi 进阶教程将在 Gephi 中文教程的基础上介绍Gephi 的统计功能，学习这门课程可以使 Gephi 中文教程的学习者获得网络科学方面的基础知识，并对于今后以网络科学为框架对多种网络现象展开研究提供基础的准备。

目前发布的是统计中网络平均度有关的部分，课程的内容包括基本的概念，也会介绍Gephi 对于网络科学基本概念的运行方式，学习完全部课程大概需要半个月的时间。

The new tutorial will introduce Gephi Gephi Advanced statistical functions on the basis of Gephi Chinese tutorial on this course allows learners Gephi Chinese tutorial basics network science, and science for the future in the framework of multi-network kinds of network phenomena provide the basis for the preparation of a study.

The current release is part of the average degree of the network-related statistics, the content of the course includes basic concepts, will introduce the basic concepts of science Gephi for network operation mode, learning programs completely ministry takes half the time.
title: Gephi「统计」基础
